name: optuna
full_description:
Official DockerHub repository of Optuna!

We continuously provide several kinds of images by letting GitHub Actions (You can check our workflow [here](https://github.com/optuna/optuna/blob/master/.github/workflows/dockerimage.yml)) build images from [this Dockerfile](https://github.com/optuna/optuna/blob/master/Dockerfile) on every release and push to the main branch.

If you want to try some Optuna example, images with the tag of `-dev` are one-stop-shop.  
Those images have installed all the dependencies.  
So, you can run, for example, the example of PyTorch Lightning via `docker run --rm optuna/optuna:py3.7-dev python examples/pytorch_lightning_simple.py`.
